root.name: Street Fighter EX2 Plus
root.description: Overview Skullomania's meteo strike The game features a standard Street Fighter 6 button control scheme consisting of 3 kicks and the same number of pnches. Each character is able to perform multiple super combos that consume 1 (of 3 in total) bar of combo meter or unleash a devastating meteo strike that uses the entire combo meter. Although the game plays like a standard 2D fighting game the characters are presented as fully 3D models. Apart from regular arcade and vs modes the game features 2 2 unlockable special stages (excel break, satellite fall, barrel smash with optional replay and fight against Bison II) as well as trial, practice and director modes. Playable characters Hadouken Guile Bison Vega Sagat Ryu Ken Chun Li Zangief Dhalsim Blanka Doctrine Dark Hokuto NanaseJack Vulcano Rosso AreaPullum Purma Darun MisterSkullomaniaSharonUnlockable charactersGarudaShadow Geist HayateKairi
